roleset.name: adventurous trip
roleset.note: EXPEDITION-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. (from expedition.01-n)

example.name: expedition-n: all args
example.text: Ducie Street was not discovered till the Monday, the day that Margaret and her husband went down on their hunting expedition to Howards End.

example.name: make_expedition-l
example.text: Russia 's space agency announced that it intends to soon begin developing a new space station , enabling to make the expedition to Mars and the Moon .
